---
--- Generated by libin
--- File name : explore_change_controller.lua.txt
--- DataTime : 2023/05/08
--- Description : 探索动态变换逻辑管理器
---

local explore_change_logic = enum.experience.explore_change_logic
local logic_1 = require "game/systems/explore/change/model/explore_change_logic_1"
local logic_2 = require "game/systems/explore/change/model/explore_change_logic_2"
local logic_3 = require "game/systems/explore/change/model/explore_change_logic_3"
local logic_4 = require "game/systems/explore/change/model/explore_change_logic_4"
local logic_5 = require "game/systems/explore/change/model/explore_change_logic_5"

---@class explore_change_controller
local explore_change_controller = class("explore_change_controller")

--region base api

---构造方法
---@protected
function explore_change_controller:ctor()
    ---@type table<explore_change_logic, base_change_logic>
    self.cache_logic_dict = {}
    
    self.cache_logic_dict[explore_change_logic.LOGIC_1] = logic_1.new()
    self.cache_logic_dict[explore_change_logic.LOGIC_2] = logic_2.new()
    self.cache_logic_dict[explore_change_logic.LOGIC_3] = logic_3.new()
    self.cache_logic_dict[explore_change_logic.LOGIC_4] = logic_4.new()
    self.cache_logic_dict[explore_change_logic.LOGIC_5] = logic_5.new()
end

---@public
function explore_change_controller:dispose()
    for i, v in pairs(self.cache_logic_dict) do
        v:dispose()
    end
    self.cache_logic_dict = nil
end

--endregion

--region logic


---获得指定变换逻辑
---@public
---@param logic explore_change_logic
---@return base_change_logic
function explore_change_controller:get_dynamic_change_logic(logic)
    if nil ~= self.cache_logic_dict[logic] then
        return self.cache_logic_dict[logic]
    end
    return nil
end

--endregion

return explore_change_controller
